content: As he starts getting madder, his attacks will start to have more range. Simple sweeping strikes of his mace can alter to have his weapon handle extend to bend the weapon around his back to cover a wider arc and catch you with.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
As he starts getting madder, his attacks will start to have more range. Simple sweeping strikes of his mace can alter to have his weapon handle extend to bend the weapon around his back to cover a wider arc and catch you with.
